item.title: Deployment Practices
item.description: Deployment Practices Docker I have added a basic example of Docker usage, with the usage of Docker volumes to store the logs/data in the disk. docker volume create --driver local --name varlogs --opt type=none --opt device=/var/folder_name/ --opt o=uid=root,gid=root --opt o=bind Docker container can be run with the following command along with an environment file containing the cofigurable parameters as well: docker run -itd --restart unless-stopped --name image_name --env-file env.txt -v varlogs:/var/folder_name -h=hostname_01 hub.
